Aeons ago the first species of our galaxy mastered interstellar travel and found itself alone in a vast universe.

These Firstborn traveled from star to star and seeded every planet with a Crucible of Immortality, a node in a network of a distributed database into which every sentient being can upload itself to escape death and leap from one planet to another in an instant.

We have all been liberated from our mortal bodies
ever since the Firstborn made their Holy Journey.

Humankind alone remains
ignorant of their gift.
